name: BREAKOUT! (P4RXStudios)
description:
BREAKOUT! is a 2D breakout game inspired by Atari Breakout. The game is currently in a demo state, with more features planned with future updates, as I am still developing the game. This is my first game in this style so any feedback on the game would be much appreciated.

CONTROLS:

Move the paddle with the A and D or arrow keys, and break the bricks. You can pause the game with ESC and return to the menu or reset the ball if it happens to get stuck.
